####PLUS
```{r}
lon_plus = read.csv("lon_plus.csv")
```

```{r}
Alp_lon_plus <- ggplot(lon_plus, aes(x = longitude, y = Observed)) + geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, se=FALSE) +
  theme_minimal() 
Alp_lon_plus
```


```{r}
Alp_lon_plus_lm <- lm(longitude ~ Observed, data = lon_plus)
summary(Alp_lon_plus_lm)
```

```{r}
pdf("./Figures/AlphaDiv/Observed_lat_PLUS.pdf", width = 8, height = 6 )
Alp_lat_plus + scale_colour_hue(c=75, l=65)
dev.off()
```
